Source: Getty Images - Big Sur

articles.title: Peter Xue
articles.description: Welcome to the website. I hope you enjoy it!
articles.contents:
Email: peterxue1024@stu.pku.edu.cn.
Hi, I’m Peter Xue. My Chinese name is 鎔荔(Rong-li). Currently, I am a master student in Economics at Peking University HSBC Business School (expected to graduate in July 2024) and applying to PhD programs/RA positions. I built the website for application purpose.

available upon request (not public on this site)
Personal
I have lived in Shanghai for more than 20 years (born and raised). In my spare time I like walking and exploring maps of big cities.
